191bfc5f-ee47-45b7-913a-14637f8534a7.name: BepisPlugins
191bfc5f-ee47-45b7-913a-14637f8534a7.description: A collection of essential BepInEx plugins for Koikatu / Koikatsu Party, EmotionCreators, AI-Shoujo / AI-Girl, HoneySelect2 and other games by Illusion

d4a1695a-e8ed-442c-8d00-1bb5ada31bc9.name: Illusion Fixes
d4a1695a-e8ed-442c-8d00-1bb5ada31bc9.description: A collection of fixes for common issues found in Koikatu, Koikatsu Party, EmotionCreators, AI Girl and HoneySelect2

ad005b57-2640-476f-8255-caed7680b3e3.name: Modding API for Illusion games
ad005b57-2640-476f-8255-caed7680b3e3.description: This is an API designed to make writing plugins for recent UnityEngine games made by the company Illusion easier and less bug-prone. It abstracts away a lot of the complexity of hooking the game save/load logic, creating interface elements at runtime, and many other tasks. All this while supplying many useful methods and tools

c2011e96-c9de-4aa2-af5c-fe30c8fd5367.name: TextDumpPlugin
c2011e96-c9de-4aa2-af5c-fe30c8fd5367.description: Dumps untranslated text in to .txt files so that the lines can be used by translators working on the translation projects. Normally only executes under studio on initial load. Versions for localized games run under the main game and require multiple dump stages. Check the console and/or log file for specifics

aee81848-52bd-4864-9a93-fb9b82a45478.name: TextResourceRedirector
aee81848-52bd-4864-9a93-fb9b82a45478.description: Allows translations to override individual assets. Required for some translations to function correctly

0632167c-aafc-488b-af53-18be903cff0f.name: TranslationSync
0632167c-aafc-488b-af53-18be903cff0f.description: A plugin for correctly formatting translation files. Corrects formatting and copies translations from one file to another for the same personality in case of duplicate entries. Used by translators working on the Koikatsu Story Translation project. No need to download unless you're working on translations

0fe08d74-85e1-4e4c-9904-4d7ad7961764.name: AnimationController
0fe08d74-85e1-4e4c-9904-4d7ad7961764.description: Allows attaching IK nodes to objects to create custom animations. Press the Minus (-) hotkey to bring up the menu. This hotkey can be configured in the F1 plugin settings

b9283a7a-7613-44c3-85c6-bc97dd4daf80.name: AnimationOverdrive
b9283a7a-7613-44c3-85c6-bc97dd4daf80.description: Type in to the animation speed box in Studio for gimmicks and character animations to go past the normal limit of 3

e7035cfc-8497-4c2b-8eeb-c0abda687329.name: CharacterExport
e7035cfc-8497-4c2b-8eeb-c0abda687329.description: Press Ctrl+E (configurable) to export all loaded character. Used for exporting characters from Studio scenes and such

23104d56-579c-45cf-88dd-9c4e618c169c.name: IPALoaderX
23104d56-579c-45cf-88dd-9c4e618c169c.description: IPALoaderX is a plugin for BepInEx that allows to load plugins made for Illusion Plugin Architecture without installing it

98d785a7-68ca-48d5-b986-f445f0b7ef27.name: EnableFullScreenToggle
98d785a7-68ca-48d5-b986-f445f0b7ef27.description: Enables toggling full screen with alt+enter on games with it disabled

228263f0-ff01-4cde-8ddd-fbde23da90bc.name: EnableResize
228263f0-ff01-4cde-8ddd-fbde23da90bc.description: Enable window resizing. Must be enabled in the plugin config either by editing the plugin's .cfg file or by using ConfigurationManager

f853e45b-6624-4e97-b5db-43e04801eb2e.name: InputHotkeyBlock
f853e45b-6624-4e97-b5db-43e04801eb2e.description: Prevents plugin hotkeys from triggering while typing in an input field

c32495d7-fbcd-4691-8a69-5be22a909d35.name: MessageCenter
c32495d7-fbcd-4691-8a69-5be22a909d35.description: A simple plugin that shows any log entries marked as "Message" on screen. Plugins generally use the "Message" log level for things that they want the user to read

7e92bde0-779f-4730-9511-63c04b4fc563.name: MuteInBackground
7e92bde0-779f-4730-9511-63c04b4fc563.description: Adds an option to mute a game when it loses focus, i.e. when alt-tabbed. Must be enabled in the plugin config either by editing the plugin's .cfg file or by using ConfigurationManager

a4ed82cd-d06e-4691-a2a3-88153cfbd729.name: OptimizeIMGUI
a4ed82cd-d06e-4691-a2a3-88153cfbd729.description: Reduce unnecessary GC allocations of Unity's IMGUI (OnGUI) interface system. It fixes the passive GC allocations that happen every frame caused by using any OnGUI code at all, and reduces GC allocations for OnGUI code

c85f38bc-8723-4816-9aa3-3ec477853140.name: DemystifyExceptions
c85f38bc-8723-4816-9aa3-3ec477853140.description: Turns exceptions into a more readable format. Resolves enumerators, lambdas and other complex structures

28b15d81-ba13-413c-8290-3d9d6997aa55.name: MirrorInternalLogs
28b15d81-ba13-413c-8290-3d9d6997aa55.description: This preloader patcher allows to capture and mirror Unity internal debug logs (i.e. the contents of output_log.txt)

a0cf9a40-500d-406e-90be-c0f83177ed1e.name: ScriptEngine
a0cf9a40-500d-406e-90be-c0f83177ed1e.description: Loads and reloads BepInEx plugins from the BepInEx\scripts folder. User can reload all of these plugins by pressing the keyboard shortcut defined in the config. Shortcut is F6 by default

6a94d7e0-1070-4507-8ed3-92b884364c28.name: Simple Mono Profiler
6a94d7e0-1070-4507-8ed3-92b884364c28.description: A simple profiler that can be used in any Unity player build as long as it can run BepInEx 5.x. It can generate a .csv file with profiling results from an arbitrary length of time

dcb8723b-f5b1-4ee6-afdc-e4fcb4895411.name: Startup Profiler
dcb8723b-f5b1-4ee6-afdc-e4fcb4895411.description: Log and report the time spent in the Start, Awake, Main, .ctor and .cctor methods of each plugin
